analyzed: shr badzra ba ra h kalpa:sarbbartha sa dha nam na ma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub ba zhes byed ba

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo la phyag tshal lo

original: aom hr'im gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarbba dusht'a na h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hrm gha ta ya gha ta ya sarbba dushta na hum phat sva ha

original: gtor ma byin nas bsam gtan bya'o //
analyzed: thor ma byin nas bsam gtan byed

original: lte pa'i dbus su ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa /
analyzed: lte ba dbus su ram las byung ba me dkyil khor dmar po gru gsum ba

original: de'i dbus su padma kha dog dmar po 'dab ma bzhi pa /
analyzed: de dbus su padma kha dog dmar po dab ma bzhi ba

original: de'i steng du hr'i: yi ge kalpa'i me 'bar ba can de yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: de steng du hr: yi ge kalpa me bar ba can de yongs su gyur ba las

original: bdag rdo rje phag mor bsam pa ni sku mdog dmar mo ro'i gdan la zhabs g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: bdag rdo rje phag mor bsam ba ni sku mdog dmar mo ro gdan la zhabs g-yas rkyong ba bzhugs ba

original: gcer bu skra gyen du brdzes pa thod pa'i cod pan can phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa phyag bzhi pa g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'chang ba /
analyzed: bcer bu skra gyen du brdzes ba thod ba cod pan can phyag rgya lngas rgyan ba phyag bzhi ba g-yas na rdo rje dang lcags kyu chang ba

original: g-yon pa kha tv'am ga thod pa dang sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon ba kha tv ga thod ba dang sdigs mdzub zhags ba chang ba

original: @10a * // zhal gcig spyan gsum pa zhal khro gnyer can rdo rje dbyings shin tu 'jigs par mdzad pa /
analyzed: zhal gcig spyan gsum ba zhal khro gnyer can rdo rje dbyings shin tu jigs ba mdzad ba

original: gsus pa rgyas pa ljags 'gyu ba'o //
analyzed: gsus ba rgya ba ljags gyu ba

original: de ltar bsams nas ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bsams nas ye shes sems dpa gugs jug byed

original: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myangs nas mnyam par gzhag pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas mchod ba dang bstod ba dang bdud rtsi myangs nas mnyam ba jog ba sngags bzlas ba byed

original: aom badzra b'a r'a h'i a'a be sha ya sarbba dusht'a ni hr'im sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra ba ra h aa be sha ya sarbba dushta ni hrm sva ha

original: nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba snying po

original: aom h'um hr'im ham snying po'o //
analyzed: aom hum hrm ham snying po

original: 'bum yang dag par bzlas par yur na grub pa la the tshom med do //
analyzed: bum yang dag ba bzlas ba yur na grub ba la the tshom med do

original: aom a'a:hr'im h'um h'am ha:sngags 'dis sha chen po'i phyi ma byas te thang sku'i drung du bdug pa dbul lo //
analyzed: aom aa:hrm hum h ha:sngags dis sha chen po phyi ma byed te thang sku drung du bdug ba bul lo

original: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste 'di gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis grub ste di gzhan du ma yin no

original: aom hr'im ham h'am ha:h'a:hi:h'i:hri:hr'i:phem phem phat mtshan mo gtor ma phu lan bdud thams cad zhi bar 'gyur pas mtshan mo gtor ba'i nye spyod dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom hrm ham h ha:ha:hi:h:hri:hr:phem phem phat mtshan mo thor ma phu lan bdud thams cad zhi ba gyur ba mtshan mo thor ba nye spyod bul ba byed

original: gong du ji skad bshad pa gsang par sgrub na rdo rje phag mos byin gyis rlob pa de la the tshem med do //
analyzed: gong du ji skad chad ba gsang ba sgrub na rdo rje phag mos byin gyis rlob ba de la the tshem med do

original: dpal rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rje zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje phag mo sgrub thabs kyi cho ga don thams cad grub ba zhes byed ba slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rje zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad ba rdzogs so

original: // / lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos rtsang nyad ro cung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen po 'o ma phug gnas rnying du legs par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: lo tsa ba shakya dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos rtsang nyad ro cung ba gtsug lag khang chen po mang ma bugs gnas rnying du legs ba sgyur
